channel.title: Stat hammer/spirit sheild/vesta spear erorr?
channel.description: Hey, when i try to weild my vest spear/stat hammer/spirit sheild i cant no matter how many times i click it gives me these errors Statius Hammer: [code][tom] Unsupported item: 1205[/code] Vesta Spear: [code][tom] Unsupported item: 1249[/code] Spirit Sheild: [code][tom] Unsupported item: 11284[/code] Please help, yes the models are all good with client and sht, they were working fine, then i went to go change the names in items.cfg and now i cant weild, i also gave them bonuses, so idk whats wrong, please help :( this is what i put for the items in item.cfg: Statius Hammer: [code]item = 1205 Statius_Warhammer Statius_Warhammer_Made_By_Tom. 10 10 10 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 12[/code] Vesta Spear: [code]item = 1249 Vesta's_Spear Vesta_Spear_Made_By_Tom 62400 62400 62400 133 113 120 0 0 5 18 21 21 5 80 80[/code] Spirit shield: [code]item = 11284 Spirit_Sheild Spirit_Sheild_Made_By_Tom. 1 1 1 0 0 0 53 55 73 30 52 65 72 10 10[/code] Please help me, if you do ill give you 25% credits PLEASE :( :(

item.title: Stat hammer/spirit sheild/vesta spear erorr?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ahh its a 508. My speciality

Goto Equipment.java and find the array that contains the type of item you are adding. VLS would be in Weapons[] for example. Just add each item name into the correct array and TADA~!

Read full topic

item.title: Stat hammer/spirit sheild/vesta spear erorr?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

strn00b:

i already added the models in the client -.- it has nothing to do with the client, before i edited the bonuses and sht it was fine, now its all errory…

Its unsupported so it tells you to gtfo or else it will hack your dds irl…
So you have to fix it

item.title: Stat hammer/spirit sheild/vesta spear erorr?
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

Hey, when i try to weild my vest spear/stat hammer/spirit sheild i cant no matter how many times i click
it gives me these errors
Statius Hammer:

[tom] Unsupported item: 1205

Vesta Spear:

[tom] Unsupported item: 1249

Spirit Sheild:

[tom] Unsupported item: 11284

Please help, yes the models are all good with client and sht, they were working fine, then i went to go change the names in items.cfg and now i cant weild, i also gave them bonuses, so idk whats wrong, please help
this is what i put for the items in item.cfg:
Statius Hammer:

item = 1205	Statius_Warhammer	Statius_Warhammer_Made_By_Tom.	10	10	10	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	12

Vesta Spear:

item = 1249	Vesta's_Spear	Vesta_Spear_Made_By_Tom		62400	62400	62400	133	113	120	0	0	5	18	21	21	5	80	80

Spirit shield:

item = 11284	Spirit_Sheild	Spirit_Sheild_Made_By_Tom.	1	1	1	0	0	0	53	55	73	30	52	65	72	10	10

Please help me, if you do ill give you 25% credits PLEASE
